alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Cuyama Valley; Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Ynez Valley; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued November 02 at 9:25PM PDT until November 04 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees possible. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, Southern Salinas Valley, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, Santa Ynez Valley, Ojai Valley and Central Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Cuyama Valley; Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Ynez Valley; Southern Salinas Valley
